title: Replace header logo with custom Beyblade X image

requirements.text: Replace the text-based logo in the AppHeader component with the custom Beyblade X image that was previously pasted by the user

quotes: when I said "logo" I mean the website logo on the top of the screen, like how target's website logo has a red target, etc. make THAT image pasted the website logo

acceptanceCriteria: The AppHeader component displays the custom Beyblade X image instead of the text 'Bey Hub X'
The logo image is properly sized and positioned in the header
The logo maintains its aspect ratio and visual quality
The logo is clickable and navigates to the home page
The logo is responsive and displays correctly on mobile and desktop viewports

constraints: Do not modify the AppHeader component's authentication controls or theme toggle
Preserve the existing navigation menu structure
Use the generated image as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/generated
nonGoals: Changing the site title or branding text elsewhere in the application

required: Beyblade X logo with red and black color scheme, bold geometric design suitable for website header (beyblade-x-logo.dim_200x80.png)
